thread.title: Fantastic experience
thread.title_full: Fantastic experience - Review of DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: aliciat502
title: Fantastic experience
text: Absolutely love the Doubletree the room, the staff, the cookies the view was extraordinary I will be doing it again with my family! The young gentleman taking your luggage Ahead of time before your room is ready the bellhop absolutely fabulous. I wish everyone had this hotel staffs attitude !
